api/ASE_Assignment_Demo.AppCanvas.html.title: Class AppCanvas | mysite
api/ASE_Assignment_Demo.AppCanvas.html.keywords: Class AppCanvas Namespace ASE_Assignment_Demo Assembly ASE Assignment Demo.dll Represents a drawable canvas that supports various shapes and text. public class AppCanvas : ICanvas Inheritance object AppCanvas Implements ICanvas Inherited Members object.Equals(object) object.Equals(object, object) object.GetHashCode() object.GetType() object.MemberwiseClone() object.ReferenceEquals(object, object) object.ToString() Constructors AppCanvas() Initializes a new instance of the AppCanvas class. Sets the canvas size and default pen color. public AppCanvas() Properties PenColour Gets or sets the pen color. public object PenColour { get; set; } Property Value object Xpos Gets or sets the current X position. public int Xpos { get; set; } Property Value int Ypos Gets or sets the current Y position. public int Ypos { get; set; } Property Value int Methods Circle(int, bool) Draws a circle at the current position with the specified radius. public void Circle(int radius, bool filled) Parameters radius int The radius of the circle. filled bool Indicates whether the circle should be filled. Exceptions CanvasException Thrown when the radius is negative. Clear() Clears the canvas with a gray color. public void Clear() Dispose() Disposes the resources used by the canvas. public void Dispose() DrawTo(int, int) Draws a line from the current position to the specified coordinates. public void DrawTo(int toX, int toY) Parameters toX int The X coordinate to draw to. toY int The Y coordinate to draw to. Exceptions CanvasException Thrown when the coordinates are out of bounds. MoveTo(int, int) Moves the current position to the specified coordinates. public void MoveTo(int x, int y) Parameters x int The new X position. y int The new Y position. Exceptions CanvasException Thrown when the coordinates are out of bounds. Rect(int, int, bool) Draws a rectangle at the current position with the specified dimensions. public void Rect(int width, int height, bool filled) Parameters width int The width of the rectangle. height int The height of the rectangle. filled bool Indicates whether the rectangle should be filled. Reset() Resets the current position to the origin (0,0). public void Reset() Set(int, int) Sets the size of the canvas. public void Set(int xsize, int ysize) Parameters xsize int The width of the canvas. ysize int The height of the canvas. SetColour(int, int, int) Sets the pen color based on RGB values. public void SetColour(int red, int green, int blue) Parameters red int The red component of the color. green int The green component of the color. blue int The blue component of the color. Exceptions CanvasException Thrown when any color component is out of range (0-255). SetGraphics(Graphics) public void SetGraphics(Graphics graphics) Parameters graphics Graphics Tri(int, int) Draws a triangle with the specified width and height. Not implemented yet. public void Tri(int width, int height) Parameters width int The width of the triangle. height int The height of the triangle. Exceptions NotImplementedException Thrown when this method is called. WriteText(string) Writes text at the current position. Not implemented yet. public void WriteText(string text) Parameters text string The text to write. Exceptions NotImplementedException Thrown when this method is called. getBitmap() Gets the bitmap representation of the canvas. public object getBitmap() Returns object The bitmap image of the canvas.

api/ASE_Assignment_Demo.Form1.html.title: Class Form1 | mysite
api/ASE_Assignment_Demo.Form1.html.keywords: Class Form1 Namespace ASE_Assignment_Demo Assembly ASE Assignment Demo.dll Represents the main form of the application where drawing operations can be performed. This form integrates drawing functionality using the BOOSE library, allowing users to execute commands and display graphical output. public class Form1 : Form, IDropTarget, ISynchronizeInvoke, Sets up the canvas and initializes the drawing context, including the configuration of BOOSE library components such as the parser and program storage. public Form1() Methods Dispose(bool) Clean up any resources being used. protected override void Dispose(bool disposing) Parameters disposing bool true if managed resources should be disposed; otherwise, false.

api/ASE_Assignment_Demo.html.title: Namespace ASE_Assignment_Demo | mysite
api/ASE_Assignment_Demo.html.keywords: Namespace ASE_Assignment_Demo Classes AppCanvas Represents a drawable canvas that supports various shapes and text. Form1 Represents the main form of the application where drawing operations can be performed. This form integrates drawing functionality using the BOOSE library, allowing users to execute commands and display graphical output.

index.html.title: This is the HOMEPAGE. | mysite
index.html.keywords: This is the HOMEPAGE. Refer to Markdown for how to write markdown files. Quick Start Notes: Add images to the images folder if the file is referencing an image.
